description:
Midousuji, who has released his full power and metamorphosized, and Naruko, who shows off the pure full-power sprint he`s honed for this day, approach the finish line. But Kuroda`s extremely close cornering and desperate assistance propels Ashikiba forward to catch up to them! "I am strong!" With a push on the back from Kuroda, Ashikiba enters a three-way finish line sprint with Midousuji and Naruko! As they throw their bikes towards the finish line, they cross at nearly the same time. Who will win the first day of the Inter-high...?!
Source: crunchyroll
